00027 void Connect(QObject *srco, const QString & src, QObject *desto, const QString & dest)
00028 {
00029     if (!QObject::connect(srco, src.toUtf8(), desto, dest.toUtf8(), Qt::QueuedConnection)) {
00030         QString tmp;
00031         QMessageBox::critical(0, "Signal connection error", QString("Error connecting %1::%2 to %3::%4").arg( (tmp = srco->objectName()).isNull() ? "(unnamed)" : tmp ).arg(src.mid(1)).arg( (tmp = desto->objectName()).isNull() ? "(unnamed)" : tmp ).arg(dest.mid(1)));
00032         QApplication::exit(1);
00033         // only reached if event loop is not running
00034         std::exit(1);
00035     }
00036 }

00038 StimApp *stimApp()
00039 {
00040      return StimApp::instance();
00041 }
00042 
00044 QString glGetErrorString(int err)
00045 {
00046     if (stimApp() && stimApp()->glWin()) stimApp()->glWin()->makeCurrent();
00047     else return "No GL Context!";
00048     switch (err) {
00049     case GL_INVALID_OPERATION:
00050         return "Invalid Operation";
00051     case GL_INVALID_ENUM:
00052         return "Invalid Enum";
00053     case GL_NO_ERROR:
00054         return "No Error";
00055     case GL_INVALID_VALUE:
00056         return "Invalid Value";
00057     case GL_OUT_OF_MEMORY:
00058         return "Out of Memory";
00059     case GL_STACK_OVERFLOW:
00060         return "Stack Overflow";
00061     case GL_STACK_UNDERFLOW:
00062         return "Stack Underflow";
00063     }
00064     return QString("UNKNOWN: ") + QString::number(err);
00065 }

00067 Log::Log()
00068     : doprt(true), str(""), s(&str, QIODevice::WriteOnly)
00069 {
00070 }
00071 
00072 Log::~Log()
00073 {    
00074     if (doprt) {        
00075         s.flush(); // does nothing probably..
00076         QString theString = QString("[Thread ") + QString::number((unsigned long)QThread::currentThreadId()) + " "  + QDateTime::currentDateTime().toString("M/dd/yy hh:mm:ss.zzz") + "] " + str;
00077 
00078         if (stimApp()) {
00079             stimApp()->logLine(theString, color);
00080         } else {
00081             // just print to console for now..
00082             std::cerr << theString.toUtf8().constData() << "\n";
00083         }
00084     }
00085 }

00087 Debug::~Debug()
00088 {
00089     if (!stimApp() || !stimApp()->isDebugMode())
00090         doprt = false;
00091     color = Qt::darkBlue;
00092 }

00106 double random(double min, double max)
00107 {
00108     static bool seeded = false;
00109     if (!seeded) { seeded = true; qsrand(std::time(0));  }
00110     int r = qrand();
00111     return double(r)/double(RAND_MAX-1) * (max-min) + min;
00112 }

00114 Status::Status(int to)
00115     : to(to), str(""), s(&str, QIODevice::WriteOnly)
00116 {
00117     s.setRealNumberNotation(QTextStream::FixedNotation);
00118     s.setRealNumberPrecision(2);
00119 }

00121 Status::~Status()
00122 {
00123     if (stimApp()) stimApp()->statusMsg(str, to);
00124     else {
00125         std::cerr << "STATUSMSG: " << str.toUtf8().constData() << "\n";
00126     }
